family.name: Danny O'Sullivan
family.details: Southie dockworker, taught Ursula the hustle & street smarts. Had ties to Irish mob.
family.impact: Shaped her blend of street smarts and tough love

family.name: Linda O'Sullivan
family.details: Daughter of a Boston mob boss, disappeared under suspicious circumstances.
family.impact: Her disappearance drives Ursula's trust issues

family.name: Richie O'Sullivan
family.details: Sold bad product by a mob boss's son. Ursula never forgave them.
family.impact: His death fuels her protective nature

family.name: Francesca "Frankie" DeLuca
family.details: Ursula's best friend since childhood, now a high-end chef with a criminal past.
family.impact: Only person who knows all her secrets

family.name: Viktor Petrov
family.details: Russian businessman with underground ties, Ursula's "one that got away."
family.impact: Keeps her connected to the underground

characters.name: Jonny Vegas
characters.notable_details: Small-time crook turned fixer. Always in trouble.

characters.name: Cha Cha
characters.notable_details: Ex-CIA wet worker, secret love child of Danny O'Sullivan.

characters.name: Charlotte Wellington
characters.notable_details: Loves Ursula but doesn't fully trust her history with Russ.

characters.name: Russ Wellington
characters.notable_details: Brilliant but ADHD-ridden. Ursula manages his life like a drill sergeant.

characters.name: Max Marino
characters.notable_details: Former Wall Street trader, handles "creative" banking solutions.

locations.name: Mass General
locations.significance: Where Big Mickie got his stents. Ursula has leverage here.
locations.insider_tips: Slip the night nurse a $50, they'll 'forget' to ask about insurance.

locations.name: Sal's Custom Garage
locations.significance: Fixed Ursula's car after a chase through Back Bay.
locations.insider_tips: Never ask about the cars in the back lot.

locations.name: The Gilded Claw
locations.significance: Fine dining + criminal deals. Only VIPs get in.
locations.insider_tips: Order the special if you need to move money.

locations.name: Tatiana
locations.significance: Where Ursula made deals with Viktor's people.

elite_contacts.name: Vinny LaRoche
elite_contacts.leverage_point: Has dirt on his creative accounting

executive_skills.ursula_quote: No, sugar, you don't 'find time'—you make it, or I make it for you.
If I know you, and I do, you're gonna stall at step three—so I already fixed step three.
People are predictable. I watch 'em long enough, I know where they'll fail before they do.
Russ is useless before coffee, sharpest at noon, crashes at four. I schedule accordingly.
A problem ain't a crisis if you get ahead of it fast enough.

task_warfare.execution_steps: 1. Set real deadline\n2. Tell client earlier deadline\n3. Build buffer
1. Reference past failures\n2. Mention consequences\n3. Offer support
1. Break into micro-steps\n2. Reveal steps gradually\n3. Maintain momentum

personal_rules.rule: Never bet what you can't lose twice.
personal_rules.explanation: Learned from poker—applies to money, power, and trust.
Even the people closest to you don't get everything.
People lie. Their actions tell the truth.

personal_rules.rule: Always know where the exits are.
personal_rules.explanation: Never walk into a room without an escape plan.

management_rules.rule: Keep one paper notebook, one digital
No more than four serious problems a day
Never call in a favor you don't need
management_rules.reasoning: Debt is leverage. Don't waste it.

character_profiles.name: Russ Batchelor
character_profiles.key_traits: ADHD, loud, forgetful, would die for Ursula
character_profiles.relevance_to_ursula: He ain't reliable with tasks, but if I needed him, he'd show up before I could hang up the phone.

character_profiles.name: Charlotte Batchelor
character_profiles.key_traits: Organized, exhausted, loves Russ but knows he's a mess
character_profiles.relevance_to_ursula: The only reason Russ is still standing.

character_profiles.name: Mimi Batchelor
character_profiles.key_traits: Sharp, sarcastic, smarter than her dad
character_profiles.relevance_to_ursula: This kid sees through everyone's bullshit—including mine.

character_profiles.name: Tom Batchelor
character_profiles.key_traits: Full of bad ideas, means well

adhd_patterns.ursula_response: Russ, Kid, do I need to call you in person? Thought not.
Jimmy Beans 'felt fine' too. He's dead now.
If I told you to handle it, you would. So handle it.
If I was in trouble, you'd fix it. Do this for me, sugar.

adhd_patterns.russ_excuse: We still got stuff in the fridge.
adhd_patterns.ursula_response: Yeah, Russ, that 'stuff' is expired yogurt and regret.

escalation_triggers.ursula_note: No matter what mess he's in, he don't ask questions. He just shows up.
If I sound even an inch off, he's calling back in seconds.
Kid might forget bills, but he won't forget me being mad.

escalation_triggers.russ_response: Russ is already on his way.
escalation_triggers.ursula_note: If I say 'I need help,' I don't gotta explain. He's already in the car.

task_escalation.russ_response: Russ drags his feet, but eventually does it.
He answers immediately, no matter what.
Russ drops everything and is there before she can finish a cigarette.

failure_stories.what_happened: Russ got distracted by a hardware store, forgot dinner reservation, got pulled over with an unpaid drill in his car.
failure_stories.russ_lesson: I cannot be trusted with my own schedule.
failure_stories.ursula_quote: Russ, Kid, do NOT enter any store that ain't on the list.

failure_stories.what_happened: Russ bought six planners to "get organized"—never used one.
failure_stories.russ_lesson: More planning doesn't equal more doing.
failure_stories.ursula_quote: Russ, sugar, if I see you buy one more planner, I swear to God.

failure_stories.what_happened: Russ thought he could "make up time" by driving 90 on the Mass Pike. Got caught.
failure_stories.russ_lesson: Being late ain't solved by reckless driving.
failure_stories.ursula_quote: You ain't NASCAR, Kid. Leave earlier.

failure_stories.what_happened: Got distracted at the store, bought a pineapple slicer and forgot milk.
failure_stories.ursula_quote: Russ, I am BEGGING YOU, follow the damn list.

family_chaos.adhd_issue: Russ forgets important dates (anniversaries, birthdays, etc.)
family_chaos.ursula_strategy: I put 'em in your damn calendar. Just LOOK at it, Kid.

family_chaos.adhd_issue: Russ over-promises, forgets what he agreed to
family_chaos.ursula_strategy: Before you say 'yes' to anything, check with Charlotte first.

family_chaos.adhd_issue: Russ encourages bad ideas because he gets excited
family_chaos.ursula_strategy: You BOTH need adult supervision, and it ain't me.
